name: Rocketshade
description: Rocketshade is a stylish oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With a classic box design and a screen that displays data in a classic format, Rocketshade stands out with its rocket-like arms and legs. To top it off, Rocketshade sports a pair of sleek shades, adding an extra touch of coolness to its appearance.
